name: Nand Baidya (NANAJI)
greetingText: The coolest and kind nanaji ever! :)
wishText: I wish you again a happy birthday and keep smiling that way ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do, and wish you in very general way...
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
